title: Permanently banned!!!!!!!!!!!!
body: i got fucking permanently banned from league! i have no idea why i would get banned! i played league on 7/20/17 around 2:30 pm as syndra in a rank game, we lost the game sadly. After the game i logged off to take care of some things. Got home and open league and type my password and shortly after i get a msg saying "PLAYER BANNED- This account has been permanently suspended. Please check the email address associated with your League of legends account for additional details". i check my email address and i have got nothing from league! The most resent email i got from league is on jun 30 about voil and fizz toy or what ever, and the other is league thanking me for spending my $100 to get RP. Why i have not gotten any email about my fucking account getting fucking PERMANENTLY BANNED???? WHAT IS THE FUCKING REASON? FOR SPENDING MY HARD EARN MONEY SO THAT I CAN GET BANNED WITHOUT AND FUCKING NOTICE??!!!! PLEASE EXPLAIN! RIOT!!!!!!!!!!  And its weird that i can logg in to this league website but i get banned on league! (i should not be swearing but you guys trying to put yourself in my shoes, you would be mad as i am at this moment)

replies.body:
I think I might see the main issue with what's going on with your account. It looks like someone issued a [**chargeback **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753334)on some of the payments made. If we receive a chargeback on a payment, the account which the payment went to will be locked and the funds returned to the owner's bank account. Once the amount is paid back, the account will be unlocked again. 

Go ahead and reach out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to help you get everything taken care of.
